variants.Description in input context: This variant is a missense variant altering a conserved glycine residue.

Material used.Description: SH-SY5Y cells were transfected with plasmid expressing the DJ-1 variant.

Readout description.Result Description: Cells expressing the DJ-1 variant showed a 20% reduction in viability compared to control cells.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were performed in triplicate, and results were averaged.

Technical replicates.Description: Technical replicates were not explicitly described in the text

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 expressing plasmid was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used to compare the viability between the groups.
